description:
Use Case Description
---------------------
LANG-421 addresses a regression between version 2.3 RC3 and 2.4 RC1.
'testEscapeJavaWithSlash' is found in the issue and as a test case in a future version. 
Issue: Forward slashes are escaping text but are not valid escape characters.
This test case passes in V2.3 but fails in V2.4
